name: arroz congri
directions: Arroz congr√≠
(1) Bacon. (2) Diced veg. (3) Rice. (4) Beans. (5) Water. (6) Spices.
If using bacon: in dutch oven, fry bacon on med high (7/10) for just a bit. Turn heat down to 4/10 for veg.
Med heat dutch oven. Saute onion, garlic, peppers til soft (3-5 min).
Add rice, beans with can liquid, water, and spices.
Cover, reduce heat to low/med low, and cook 30-40 min. (keep covered, rice needs the steam to cook).
Take off heat, leave covered 5-10 min. Fluff, serve with chopped bacon, if using.

name: jambalaya

items.name: light soy sauce
items.note: equal parts ketchup and soy sauce to sub for worcestershire sauce

directions: (1) Chicken. (2) Onion, bell pepper, celery, garlic. (3) Sausage. (4) Tomato, spices, ketchup, soy sauce. (5) Broth, rice. (6) Shrimp.
Heat oil over med heat (5/10) in large pot or Dutch oven.
Add chicken if using, cook til no longer pink (~3 min) [originally cook til golden ~5min]
Add onion, bell pepper, celery, garlic, cook til tender (~5 min)
Add sausage, cook for ~1 min.
Add crushed tomatoes + seasonings, cook for 8 min, stirring occasionally.
Add broth and rice. Reduce heat to med low (4/10).
Wait until bubbling a little! Then cover. Cook til rice tender and liquid almost absorbed (32 min), stirring once halfway thru cooking time.
Stir in shrimp at the end. Cook for up to 7 more min (uncovered if liquid needs to reduce)
Note: the cooking times and heats are finally correct, please don't adjust

name: paella

items.name: roma tomato
items.note: very finely diced (or sub 8oz tomato sauce)

items.name: saffron
items.note: 1 pinch; or use 1 tsp saffron powder if really needed

items.name: white wine vinegar
items.note: to sub for original white wine

items.name: dried parsley
items.note: to sub for original 4 tbsp fresh chopped parsley

items.name: white rice
items.note: DONT WASH; subs for original spanish rice; dont use long grain!!

directions: (1) Diced onion, bell pepper, garlic. (2) Chicken, rice. (3) Water, wine, spices. (4) Tomato, peas. (5) Seafood. (6) Parsley.
Heat oil in skillet med heat. Add onion, garlic, pepper, cook for a few min.
Add chicken + rice, cook 2-3 min.
Stir in water, wine, thyme, saffron, salt, pepper. Bring to boil. Simmer 15 min, stirring occassionally.
At this point, taste rice and see if cooked. If uncooked, stir in 1/2c more water, continue cooking while stirring occasionally. Use up to 2c additional water if necessary.
Cook till rice is done.
Stir in tomatoes and peas (and raw squid, if using). Cook for 2 min.
Arrange seafood (i.e. shrimp, mussels) on top. Cover, leave for 3-5 min.
Serve with parsely garnish.
OLD STEPS:::
(1) Diced onion, bell pepper, garlic. (2) Diced tomato, bayleaf, paprika, saffron, salt, pepper, chicken. (3) White wine. (4) Parsley, rice. (5) Seafood, peas.
Don't wash rice before cooking.
If using frozen seafood, defrost overnight.
Olive oil skillet med heat. Cook onion, bell pepper, garlic, til onion is transparent.
Add tomato, bay leaf, paprika, saffron, salt, pepper, and chicken. Stir and cook 5 min.
Add white wine. Cook 10 min.
Add half the parsley and rice to pot. Cook 1 min.
Pour broth slowly all around pan. Jiggle pan to get rice into an even layer (DO NOT stir the mixture going forward)
Bring to boil. Reduce heat to med low. Shake pan gently back and forth once or twice during cooking. Cook 15-18 min uncovered.
Nestle seafood in. Sprinkle peas on top. Cook (NO stirring) for ~5 min.
Most of liquid should be absorbed and the rice on top should be nearly tender. (If rice not cooked for some reason, add 1/4c more water and keep cooking)
Remove pan from heat. Cover with lid and rest for 10 min.
Garnish with rest of parsley and serve.

name: risotto
directions: (1) Shallot, olive oil. (2) Rice. (3) Wine. (4) Chives, parmesan, seasoning, butter.
In a small pot, bring chicken stock to a simmer at 6/10 heat.
Cook shallot in olive oil until transparent but not browned (start tat 4/10, go up to 5/10 heat) in dutch oven.
Add in uncooked rice, saute for 1 min.
Add wine to deglaze, then cook down.
Cook rice, slowly adding simmering stock from the small pot one ladle at a time.
Taste while cooking. When al dente (likely when most of stock is out), add chives + parmesan + seasoning + butter.

name: puerto rican arroz con pollo
directions: (1) Marinated chicken. (2) Sofrito veg. (3) Sazon seasoning. (4) Tomato sauce + water. (5) Rice + peas.
Chicken in large bowl. Add 1 tbsp oil and adobo seasoning. Toss chicken with hands. Cover and marinate 30 min, or skip and just cook

Add 1 tbsp oil to deep skillet or Dutch oven, med high heat (but start at a lower heat!!). Once oil is hot, add chicken. Cook til browned (4-5 min). Flip and cook til browned (another 4-5min). Remove, set aside on plate.
Using leftover grease in pan, make sofrito. Add sofrito vegetables, saute for 2-3 min. Add sazon seasoning, cook for 30 sec.
Add tomato sauce and water. Stir well to combine.
Bring to simmer. Fold in rice and peas, make sure evenly distributed. Add browned chicken on top.
Reduce heat to low (3/10), cover immediately, cook for 28 min
After 28 min, most of liquid should be absorbed, rice cooked. Garnish with cilantro and squeeze fresh lime juice.

name: mediterranean chicken rice
directions: (1) Marinated chicken. (2) Chopped veg. (3) Peas, rice, misc seasoning, water. (4) Bay leaf, cinnamon stick. (5) Parsely, feta.
Chicken in large bowl, tossed with seasoning (no oil is correct). Cover and marinate 20 min, or skip and just cook

2tbps oil Dutch oven, med high heat (start at 4/10). Once oil is hot, add chicken (now work up to 6/10). Cook til browned (4min, do not reduce further). Flip and cook til browned (another 3min, do not reduce further). Remove, set aside on plate.
Using leftover grease in pan, cook veg 4 min. Add peas, rice, seasoning, water. Stir to combine. Top with bay leaf and cinnamon stick.
Bring to simmer. Add browned chicken on top.
Reduce heat to low (3/10), cover immediately, cook for 30 min (the heat and times are correct!)
After 30 min, most of liquid should be absorbed, rice cooked. Garnish with parsley and feta and optional squeeze of lemon juice.

name: arroz de tamboril
directions: (1) Onion, garlic, peppers, bay leaf. (2) Tomato. (3) Fish, spices, wine. (4) Water. (5) Rice. (6) Seafoods.
Large pot (dutch oven), oil + onion, garlic, peppers, bay leaf. Stir and cook 5 min. Med heat.
Add tomato. Cook another 5 min.
Add fish, season with the spices, pour in wine. Bring to boil.
When starting to boil, turn fish pieces over, and let cook another 5 min.
Add water, and bring to boil.
Once boiling, stir in rice. Cook for 10 min.
Add (raw..) seafoods and cook for another 7 min, til everything is cooked.

name: red beans and rice

ingredients.category: spices, or 1.5 tsp jambalaya spice mix

directions: (1) Onion, celery, bell pepper, garlic. (2) Sausage. (3) Rice, beans, tomato paste, broth, spices.
Dutch oven med heat. Cook onion, celery, bell pepper, garlic 5+ min.
Add and cook sausage 3+ min.
Add rest of ingredients. Lower heat to 4/10. Cover and cook 35 min.
Uncover to stir halfway.

name: chinese sausage rice
directions: (1) Chicken marinade. (2) Rice + water. (3) Wood ear. (4) Sauce + green onion.
Rinse and drain mushrooms. Slice into thin strips.
Combine all of chicken marinade ingredients with mushroom. Set aside at least 4hr in the fridge.
Wash rice, drain. Place rice + 1c water in dutch oven, leave to soak 3+hr.
After soaking, place dutch oven with rice on med heat with lid off. Bring water and rice to a simmer.
Once simmering, add wood ear, then add chicken mixture, spreading gently and evenly on top of rice.
Place lid on dutch oven. Turn heat to low (4/10). Cook for 30 min.
After 30min, check if meat cooked. (If not, close lid and check again in 10min)
When finished, sprinkle with green onion, drizzle on sauce. Mix rice with meat layer and serve.

name: colombian sudado de pollo

items.name: chicken thigh
items.note: instead of 8 skinless drumsticks. leave whole or cut in half

items.name: paprika
items.note: or turmeric/saffron. to sub ground annatto

directions: (1) Oil, pepper, onion. (2) Chicken, garlic, tomato, salt, pepper. (3) Potato, broth, Sazon, cumin, cilantro.
In Dutch oven, heat oil over med heat. Add pepper + onion, saute til onion transcluent (3-4min).
Add chicken, garlic, tomato, salt, pepper. Cook stirring til lightly browned (4min).
Add potatoes, chicken broth, Sazon seasoning, cumin, cilantro.
Bring to boil, then reduce heat to med-low, partially cover, and simmer for 30min or til potatoes tender.
Add more water if too dry, or cook down for longer if too watery, as needed. Garnish with more cilantro.

name: colombian arroz atollado

items.name: chicken thigh
items.note: originally boneless country-style pork ribs or sirloin. 1 inch cubes

items.name: white rice
items.note: Jasmine or Basmati. NOT long grain. reduced from 1 c

items.name: andouille sausage
items.note: sliced. or 1/2lb chorizo or other smoked sausage

items.name: paprika
items.note: or turmeric/saffron. to sub ground annatto

directions: (1) Hogao sauce, Sazon. (2) Oil, pork. (3) Water, broth, salt. (4) Rice, potato, sausage.
In small saucepan, make hogao sauce. Cook all hogao ingredients plus the Sazon over med-low heat 10-15min stirring often. Remove from heat, set aside.
In Dutch oven, heat oil over med high heat. Cook pork 4-5 min each side til outside cooked. (Note: if sausage is raw, cook with pork now)
Add water, chicken broth, salt. Cover and cook med heat 20 min.
Into Dutch oven, add rice, potato, sausage, hogao. Bring to boil, cover, reduce to med-low.
Simmer for 10-15min. Uncover and cook til reduced, rice cooked, potatoes cooked (10 min).
If needed, add water or cook down extra as needed. Should be risotto consistency.
Garnish with cilantro.

name: ropa vieja

items.name: white wine vinegar
items.note: to sub for dry white wine

directions: Season beef with salt and pepper.
Heat olive oil in a pot over high heat. Add the beef and brown on all sides. Then transfer to a plate.
Add onion and peppers to pot and cook over med heat for 15-20 minutes til caramelized.
Add garlic, oregano, cumin, paprika. Cook for another min. Add white wine and bring to boil, scraping the bottom of the pan with the flat edge of a spatula to deglaze.
Add beef broth and crushed tomatoes. Bring to a simmer.
Return beef to the pot. Bring to a simmer and cover for 2-3 hours or til beef is fork-tender.
Transfer the beef to a plate and shred. Return shredded beef to sauce.
Stir in the olives (1 c pimiento or manzanilla Spanish olives, rinsed/drained; optional).
Simmer uncovered for 30 minutes to thicken.
Stir in parsley and season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve.

name: chile verde

items.name: pork shoulder
items.note: strictly trimmed, then cubed. results in ~350g lean meat

directions: (1) Oil, pork. (2) Onion, garlic. (3) Oregano, cumin. (4) Chicken broth. (5) Salsa.
Oil in dutch oven, med low heat (4/10). Cook pork, while gradually increasing heat to med high (6/10).
Cook til sides brown, then remove and set aside.
Saute onion + garlic in same oil. Once onion is cooked, add in oregano + cumin and mix.

Add in browned pork + chicken broth. Bring to simmer. Cover and lower to 4/10 heat for 1.5hrs (up to 4hrs, so if increasing time, add more broth!). 1.5hrs is safe from burning, but do check with 20min left if desired, and add broth if needed).
While meat cooks, slice and deseed peppers. Grill all vegetables until charred. Blend all with cilantro.
Once meat is done, add salsa to dutch oven. Bring up to simmer again, then cook for 20 more min uncovered at 4/10 heat.
Use 81% of rice for dinner, 19% of rice for lunch.
Use 75% of beans for dinner, 25% of beans for lunch.

name: chile colorado
directions: Dried chiles tip: soft and pliable best. Brittle means old and flavorless.
(1) Salsa. (2) Beef, salt, pepper. (3) Onion, garlic, onion+garlic powder, cumin. (4) Chicken broth, bay leaf, pinch of salt.
Remove the stems, then remove the seeds of all dried chiles. Rinse, place in pot of water, bring to boil.
Once boiling, remove from heat, cover, and let steep for 20-30min (til pliable).
Drain chilies, blend with 0.5c broth + oregano. Optionally strain the puree.
Med high heat, dutch oven oil. Add beef, salt, pepper.
Once meat browned, remove and set aside. Cook onion, garlic, spices til fully cooked (~15min).
Add salsa, cooked meat, mix. Pour in broth, add bay leaf and a pinch of salt. Mix.
Bring to rapid simmer. Cover, lower heat to 3/10, and cook for 1.5hrs. Uncover, and cook until reduced to liking.

name: jager kohl

items.name: ground pork
items.note: originally 1lb beef. can also be game

directions: (1) Oil, bacon, onion. (2) Ground beef. (3) Cabbage, potato, sausage, salt, pepper, caraway. (4) Water/stock.
In Dutch oven, heat oil over med heat. Cook bacon, onion, (and sausage now if raw!). Saute til lightly brown (4-5min)
Add ground beef, cook til no longer pink.
Add cabbage, potato, sausage, salt, pepper, caraway. Stir to combine. Add stock, cover, let simmer til cabbage tender (30-40min).
Enjoy with crusty bread.

name: mediterranean chicken pita

items.name: flour
items.note: approx, for extra dusting as needed

directions: Chicken:
Mix all marinade ingredients. Place chicken in shallow bowl and pour marinade over top. Toss in marinade to fully coat. Wrap and marinate 1+hr in fridge.
Bake at 400F for 25-30min til internal temp of 165F in thickest part.
Remove and let sit for 5 min before cutting/shredding. Keeps in fridge for 3-4 days.
Pickled onions:
Place water, salt, sugar, vinegar in saucepan. Heat over med heat til sugar and salt dissolved.
Remove from heat. Pour mix into jar with sliced onions. Cool at room temp for 1 hr, then at least 2hr in fridge before serving.
Fake tzatziki:
Whisk all together.
8 pitas:
In lukewarm water, stir yeast and sugar til dissolved. Add 1/2c flour and whisk together. Let sit uncovered in warm place and get bubbly, turning into a loose sponge (~15min).
Add salt, olive oil, and remaining flour. Stir til shaggy mass. Knead for about 1 min. Cover and let dough rest 10 min.
Knead again couple more min. Let dough rise in greased bowl til doubled (~1hr). After rising, can place dough in fridge til cooking time!
Divide into balls, then let rest 10 min. Flatten to about 8-9 inches (1/4inch thick)
Cook on carbon steel pan med high heat ~30sec-1min on each side.

name: shakshuka

items.name: green bell pepper
items.note: up to 2; thinly sliced or chopped

directions: (1) Ground meat. (2) Onion, bell pepper, garlic, spices. (3) Tomatoes, salt, pepper. (4) Feta, eggs.
Heat oil in a large skillet on med-low.
Add meat to pan and break up. Then, add onion, bell pepper, garlic, spices til soft (~5-10 min). Turn heat to med-high (7/10)
Pour in tomatoes and season with salt, pepper, pepper flakes. Simmer til thickened (~15min but could be more)
Stir in crumbled feta. Make little wells/indentations for eggs. Gently crack eggs in.
Reduce heat to low (4/10), put lid on, cook til eggs are just set, ~6min.
Uncover and add fresh cilantro garnish and pepper flakes if desired.

name: cilbir
directions: Mix yogurt spread ingredients, set aside room temp.
Make Aleppo butter: melt butter in saucepan over med heat til bubbles begin to burst. Add spices and stir til well incorporated. Turn off heat and let spices infuse.
Make parsley jalapeno oil: grind parsley and jalapeno in mortar, drizzle in oil and add a pinch of salt. Stir.
Poach eggs:
Mix 1c water + 1c vinegar in large bowl. Crack cold eggs in gently right above water surface.
Let eggs sit 10min (eggs should turn lightly white and opaque).
Bring 3-4qt pot (half filled with water) to a gentle simmer--tiny bubbles on bottom and should be steaming.
Use ladle to gently scoop up each egg (carry a little bit of vinegar with it) and gently drop into water.
Cook for 2-3 min.
To serve: yogurt spread on plate with an indent in center. Drizzle jalapeno oil on yogurt, then top with egg and Aleppo butter.

name: burger
directions: For buns:
Mix starter ingredients. Let rest room temp overnight.
Mix all dough ingredients with starter. Knead til smooth. Let rise in fridge overnight.
Shape into 3 buns. Let rise 1-2 hours. Bake at 425F for 20 min.
For patties:
Stainless steel 7/10 heat, no oil. 3 min on each side. Cover for a few min afterwards.

name: lamb burger
directions: For buns:
Mix starter ingredients. Let rest room temp overnight.
Mix all dough ingredients with starter. Knead til smooth. Let rise in fridge overnight.
Shape into 3 buns. Let rise 1-2 hours. Bake at 425F for 20 min.
For patties:
Stainless steel 7/10 heat, no oil. 3 min on each side. Cover for a few min afterwards.

name: simple garlic pasta
directions: Heat olive oil over med heat in saucepan/skillet.
Saute garlic til browned. Add spices. Pour over pasta, add butter.

name: saucy pasta
directions: With a pack of sausage, makes a good dinner + 1 lunch portion
Heat 2 tbsp olive oil over med heat in saucepan/skillet.
Saute onion, garlic, bell pepper for ~2 min (til onion translucent and garlic browned)
Pour in tomatoes and spices. Stir, cover, simmer for 20 min or til thickened. Pour over pasta

name: veggie pasta
directions: Chop eggplant into 1 inch cubes. Toss in olive oil and salt. Roast at 475F for 40 min. (20 min in, rotate the pan)
Cook bell pepper, onion, garlic, tomato on med high heat for 10 min, covering pan with lid.
Pour eggplant into pan and mix. Pour basil + olives into pan and mix. Pour pasta into pan.

name: sicilian pasta
directions: (1) Oil, garlic. (2) Tomato, spices. (3) Tuna, olive. (4) Pasta. (5) Basil.
Heat olive oil over med-low heat (4/10) in saucepan/skillet.
Saute garlic til browned (never going over 4/10 heat). This may take a while, but be patient.
Pour in tomatoes, spices. Stir, cover, simmer for 20 min or til thickened.
Uncover, toss in pasta, remove from heat, and stir. Once all mixed, stir in basil and serve.

name: pesto pasta
directions: Makes 1 cup (good for use with 12oz pasta)
Blend. Store covered in fridge up to a week.
Cook pasta. Cook chicken. Combine.

name: pasta puttanesca

items.name: fresh parsley
items.note: any optional garnish, like fresh basil or dried oregano

directions: (1) Oil, garlic, anchovies. (2) Crushed tomatoes. (3) Olives, capers, gochugaru. (4) Pasta + garnish.
Heat olive oil over med-low heat in saucepan/skillet. Cook garlic + anchovies til garlic lightly golden.
Add tomatoes to skillet with salt + pepper to taste.
Turn heat to med-high. Cook til becomes saucy (~10min). Stir in olives, capers, gochugaru.
Cook pasta, drain, toss with sauce (can drizzle extra tbsp of oil if you want). Garnish.

name: poached egg pasta
directions: Poach eggs:
Mix 1c water + 1c vinegar in large bowl. Crack cold eggs in gently right above water surface.
Let eggs sit 10min (eggs should turn lightly white and opaque).
Bring 3-4qt pot (half filled with water) to a gentle simmer--tiny bubbles on bottom and should be steaming.
Use ladle to gently scoop up each egg (carry a little bit of vinegar with it) and gently drop into water.
Cook for 2-3 min.

name: jamaican curry goat

items.name: dijon mustard
items.note: to sub 2/3 tsp dry yellow mustard seed + 2/3 ground fenugreek

items.name: tomato paste
items.note: supposed to be 1/2 tbsp but we don't have that

directions: (1) Goat, (2) Curry powder (either the mix above or 2.5 tbsp of curry powder), (3) Garlic, ginger, onions, tomato paste, greeen onions, (4) Potatoes
In large pot/dutch oven, heat oil on med heat til hot. Add goat, season with salt + pepper, saute and stir frequently til goat brown.
Add curry powder, stir 1-2 min.
Add garlic, ginger, onion, tomato paste, green onion. Stir 1 min.
Pour just enough water to cover goat. Bring to boil, simmer til tender (~2hr?). Stir occasionally, add more water as needed.
15-20 min before cooking ends, add potatoes. Cook til potatoes are tender.

name: lohikeitto

items.name: leek
items.note: sliced; only white and light green part!

directions: (1) Butter, leek. (2) Stock, carrot, potatoes. (3) Salmon, cream. (4) Salt, pepper, coriander, dill.
Cut veg to same size and salmon slightly bigger. Do not use onion instead of leek; shallot ok.
Dutch oven, med high heat melt butter. Cook and stir leeks til wilted (5-7min).
Add stock, carrot, potatoes. Bring to boil, then cook for 10min med heat. (Potatoes should be almost ready)
Add salmon and cream and bring to simmer. Cook for 5-6min, until salmon cooked.
Season with spices. Serve into bowls and top with chopped dill.
Lasts 3 days in fridge. To reheat, simmer soup for 4-5min over low heat, stirring frequently.

name: salmon and sweet potato
directions: Oven 400F. Put sweet potatoes in 1 hr before salmon.
Grease baking sheet with olive oil, then place salmon on top. Season salt, drizzle rest of olive oil on.
Cook salmon for 15min with sweet potato still in oven.
Take both out at same time.

name: lobster rolls
directions: Melt butter over med heat. Add in cooked lobster. Enjoy with 4 toasted hot dog buns

name: crab rolls
directions: Melt butter over med heat. Add in crab. Enjoy with 4 toasted hot dog buns

name: moqueca
directions: (1) Onion. (2) Garlic. (3) Bell pepper, spices. (4) Tomato. (5) Cilantro. (6) Fish. (7) Coconut milk.
In a pot med heat, heat oil and saute onion until transparent. Add garlic, saute a little more. Add pepper (+ spices?), cook til soft.
Stir in tomato. Bring to simmer, cook 5 min uncovered. Stir in some of the cilantro.
Arrange fish on top of veg in pot. Season with some more salt + pepper.
Pour in coconut milk.
Bring to simmer, reduce heat, place frozen shrimp on top, cover, and simmer for 15 min. If using raw shrimp, cook for 4-5 min til meat at base (head) turns from translucent to opaque.
Season to taste, lime juice optional. Garnish with rest of cilantro.

name: chicken long rice
directions: Soften noodles in hot tap water for ~30min.
Bring to boil chicken, broth, salt, ginger, garlic/sugar if using, over high heat, then reduce to med low. Simmer til chicken no longer pink (~35min).
Remove chicken. Strain broth into new pot, skim and discard the solids.
Shred chicken and return to broth.
Add noodles and simmer til noodles are soft and translucent (~5min).

name: pan bagnat
directions: For buns:
Mix starter ingredients. Let rest room temp overnight.
Mix all dough ingredients with starter. Knead til smooth. Let rise in fridge overnight.
Shape into 3 buns. Let rise 1-2 hours. Bake at 425F for 20 min.
For assembly:
Cut bread in half, with a thicker bottom. Scoop out some of the bottom to make a cavity for the fillings.
Soak both slices of bread generously in olive oil, salt, pepper.
Arrange sandwich. (Our order: anchovy, tomato, tuna, radish, peppers, olives, basil, egg.)
Press down tight. Keep chilled in fridge for 1-4hrs to let flavors develop.

name: pan con tomate
directions: For el pan:
Mix starter ingredients. Let rest room temp overnight.
Mix all dough ingredients with starter. Knead til smooth. Let rise in fridge overnight.
Let rise 1-2 hours as dough ball in lined/greased Dutch oven with lid on.
Bake at 450F with lid on for 20 min, then with lid off 5-10 more min til browned (internal temp 200F)
Remove loaf from Dutch oven. Must cool for 30min-1hr before slicing.
For assembly:
Use box grater to grate tomatoes. (Can keep grated tomatoes in airtight container in fridge for 1 day)
Toast/grill thick slices of bread. Optionally rub a peeled and halved garlic clove on the toasted slices.
Drizzle bread with olive oil. Spread grated tomato. Add salt to taste.

name: currywurst
directions: (1) Onion, olive oil. (2) Garlic. (3) Curry powder, paprika, cloves, cinnamon. (4) Tomato paste, chicken broth, vinegar, honey, soy sauce, pepper, cayenne.
Saute onion in olive oil at 4/10 heat in small saucepan til translucent. Do NOT brown it.
Add garlic. Saute for 1 min.
Add curry powder, paprika, cloves, cinnamon. Mix and cook for 30 sec.
Add rest of sauce ingredients. Cover and cook for 15 min.
Cool. Transfer to blender, blend til smooth. Can store for up to 1 month in fridge.

name: full english breakfast

items.name: butter
items.note: as needed, for eggs, mushroom, tomato, bread

directions: Baked beans:
Place all sauce ingredients (everything but cornstarch + water) in pot, stir, then add beans.
Bring to simmer, then lower heat to med low and simmer for 20 min, uncovered. Stir occasionally to prevent burning.
Pour cornstarch slurry into pot, cook for 2 more min til thickened.
Keep beans warm in pot on med low heat while cooking the rest.
Fry up meats on med heat, turning occasionally, then transfer to 200F oven to keep warm. If having black pudding, fry on med heat 3-4 min per side.
Fry up mushrooms and tomato in leftover fat, without moving to allow browning. Season with salt and pepper.
Fry up egg. Season. Fry white sliced bread in more butter, med high heat.
(Back bacon ~70cal per slice)

name: glutinous hotteok
directions: Ìò∏Îñ°
Warm water, yeast, sugar for 10min.
Mix flour, rice flour. Add yeasty water, milk, salt, knead well. Let dough rise 40min room temp.
When doubled, punch down gas. Divide into balls and fill.
Put filled balls on med heat pan til browned.
Makes 6 hotteok.

name: korean curry
directions: Ïπ¥Î†àÎùºÏù¥Ïä§

In pot, cook potato + carrot + onion (+ meat if pork or chicken) w butter on med heat til potato semi-translucent. Be patient! Cook at 5/10 heat for 10 min, then 6/10 for 10 more min. Deglaze with water if needed.
Add meat, if beef, and stir for few min til soft/meat cooked. Pour in water for deglazing if any leftover.
Add curry powder + slurry water, then cook til thickened (~10 min?). Add in cubed soft tofu if using.

name: omurice
directions: Ïò§ÎØÄÎùºÏù¥Ïä§
On stainless steel pan, med high (7/10) cook veg in oil til onion translucent. Add spam, cook few more min
Add rice, ketchup, seasonings. Cook for few more minutes.
For egg:
Whisk 4 eggs. Cook on med low (4/10) using ~10g butter. Top with 1-2 tbsp of ketchup.

name: bibimbap
directions: ÎπÑÎπîÎ∞•
Fry up meat. Fry up veggies. Fry eggs.
Assemble.

name: kimbap
directions: ÍπÄÎ∞•
Makes 5 kimbap. Use 65% for dinner.
Cook rice, mix with sesame oil and salt.
Whisk egg and fry up. Slice into strips.
Stir fry meat filling. Stir fry carrot. Stir fry spinach.
Roll with shiny side seaweed down!

name: just dinner kimbap
directions: ÍπÄÎ∞•
Makes 4 kimbap.
Cook rice, mix with sesame oil and salt.
Whisk egg and fry up. Slice into strips.
Stir fry meat filling. Stir fry carrot. Stir fry spinach.
Roll with shiny side seaweed down!

name: just dinner tuna kimbap
directions: ÍπÄÎ∞•
Makes 4 kimbap.
Mix tuna with mayo and sriracha.
Cook rice, mix with sesame oil and salt.
Roll with shiny side seaweed down!

name: jumeok bap
directions: Ï£ºÎ®πÎ∞•
Makes 6 big fists.
Mix tuna with mayo and black pepper.
Cook rice, mix with sesame seeds, sesame oil, and salt.
Roll into rice balls filled with tuna.
Crush up gim/gamtae and mix with sugar and salt. Roll rice balls in coating.

name: california roll
directions: Makes 4 rolls.
Cook rice, mix with rice vinegar, sugar, and salt.
Roll with shiny side seaweed down!

name: soondubu kimmari
directions: Carefully remove tofu from tube and carefully slide onto paper toweled hand. Sprinkle a bit of salt on top.
Wrap tube carefully with paper towel, place in fridge for 30 min to remove water.
Roll tofu in gim carefully. Slice into 1-2cm thickness.
Oil onto nonstick pan, med heat. Coat each piece of tofu in cornstarch and place onto pan, not letting pieces stick.
Fry til golden on both sides.
Pour sauce into pan to coat, serve.

name: musubi
directions: Makes 6 musubi.
Cook rice.
Fry spam with oil on med heat til slightly brown. Turn off heat, add sauce, and flip spam til coated in reduced sauce.
Whisk egg and fry up. Cut to match spam size.
Wrap all. (2 sheets = fully covered. 1 sheet = strip style.) Good in fridge for 2 days sealed.

name: tteokbokki
directions: Îñ°Î≥∂Í∏∞
Make anchovy stock: 2.5c water, green onion root, 3-4 dried anchovies, dried kelp for 15min on med heat. Or, instead of stock, use 300ml water.
Mix gochujang, gochugaru, sugar in small bowl, then add to boiling water in pan. Mix, then add everything else.
Once it starts to boil, stir with wooden spoon until rice cakes are soft and sauce is shiny (~10-15 min).

name: tofu tangsuyuk
directions: ÎëêÎ∂Ä ÌÉïÏàòÏú°
Drain tofu. Cut into 1-inch cubes. Toss in starch + salt + pepper. Fry on med heat.
Into stainless steel pan med heat, saute onion + bell pepper til onion translucent. Start at 4/10 then gradually up to 5/10.
Add carrot. Cook 3 min.
Add mushrooms, increase heat to 6/10, then pour in sauce and bring to boil. Boil for 5 min.
Add slurry gradually and cook til desired consistency.
Pour over fried tofu.

name: tofu tangsuyuk baked version
directions: (1) Pressed tofu, tofu sauce, cornstarch. (2) Oil, onion, bell pepper. (3) Carrot. (4) Mushroom, sauce. (5) Slurry.
ÎëêÎ∂Ä ÌÉïÏàòÏú°
Press and dry tofu for 15+min. Cut into 1-inch cubes.
Mix all tofu sauce ingredients (except cornstarch). Toss tofu in sauce.
Sprinkle tofu with cornstarch till all coated.
Place on lined baking sheet, no pieces touching. Bake 25-30 min 400F, stirring 2-3 times to evenly bake.
Into stainless steel pan med heat, saute onion + bell pepper til onion translucent. Start at 4/10 then gradually up to 5/10.
Add carrot. Cook 3 min.
Add mushrooms, increase heat to 6/10, then pour in sauce and bring to boil. Boil for 5 min.
Add slurry gradually and cook til desired consistency.
Pour over baked tofu.

name: jjajangmyeon
directions: (1) Green onion, pork. (2) Potato, zucchini, onion. (3) Black bean paste. (4) Cornstarch slurry + sugar. (5) Noodles.
ÏßúÏû•Î©¥
Wok on med heat (4/10 at first), 1 tbsp veg oil + green onion + pork. Cook 4-5 min til browned (gradually up to 6/10 heat).
Add potato, zucchini, onion. Cook 3-4 min til potato is translucent. Remove green onion.
Make well in center of wok. Add black bean paste. Stir and cook for 1 min.
Add ~3/4 cup of water, stir and cook for 1 min. (1 cup was maybe too much water, 3/4 c seems better).
Put lid on wok. Cook covered for 7 min at 5/10 heat.
Uncover and stir in slurry mix.
Serve over noodles!

name: japchae
directions: Ïû°Ï±Ñ
Cook vermicelli in boiling water 6 min. rinse in cold water, drain. Set to side
Stir fry onion, carrot, spinach, mushroom and drizzle with a bit of sesame oil. Set to side
Cook beef with sauce. Set to side
Vermicelli in pan with its seasonings.
Add vegetables and meat and mix.
Can store in fridge for a few days. Reheat by stir frying in a little oil over med-low heat.

name: whelk muchim somyeon
directions: Í≥®Î±ÖÏù¥Î¨¥Ïπ® ÏÜåÎ©¥
Veggies are just whatever you want (could do bell pepper, sliced green onion, onion, jalapeno, cabbage, perilla...). Soak onion and green onion in vinegar + water to reduce bite.
Chop up all the veggies into bite-size slices. Toss in a big bowl with whelk and muchim sauce.
Cook noodles, drain. Serve noodles on the side of the whelk muchim.

name: bibim guksu
directions: ÎπÑÎπîÍµ≠Ïàò
Cook noodles in boiling water 6-8min and rinse in cold water.
Mix sauce. Put sauce, egg, cucumber on noodles.

name: bibim naengmyeon

items.name: rice vermicelli
items.note: should be the chewy korean buckwheat noodles

directions: ÎπÑÎπîÎÉâÎ©¥
Cook noodles in boiling water 6-8min and rinse in cold water.
Mix sauce. Put sauce, egg, cucumber, Korean pear on noodles.

name: gamjatang

items.name: pork neck bone
items.note: equiv to 9oz pork baby back rib

directions: Í∞êÏûêÌÉï
(1) Pork, ginger, doenjang, onion, red pepper, water. (2) Blanched cabbage, optional washed + drained 8oz soy bean sprout, green onion, potato. (3) Seasoning paste, water. (4) Perilla leaves.
Rinse the pork bones a couple of times and soak in cold water for 30+ min.
Bring a large pot of water to a boil. Blanch cabbage for 1 min and then remove with tongs. Keep water boiling, will use later.
Rinse cabbage in cold water and strain. Tear leaves lengthwise once or twice to make long bite sized pieces.
Put the bones into the boiling water and cover. Cook for 7 min over med-high heat. The water will turn dark and some foam will come to the surface.
Strain and wash each bone in cold running water. Remove any extra fat, dark foamy stuff, and bone fragments.
Put the cleaned bones into a large pot.
Add ginger, soybean paste, onion, red pepper, and 11 c of water.
Cover and cook for 90 min over med-high heat.
After 90 min, add the cabbage, soy bean sprouts (if using), 3 green onions, and the peeled potatoes.
Mix garlic, gochugaru, gochujang, fish sauce, perilla seed powder, black pepper, and 1/4 c water in a bowl.
Add this seasoning paste + 1/2 c water into pot.
Cover and cook for 30-40 min over med-high heat until potatoes are fully cooked.
Add the perilla leave, stir, and serve.

name: spicy pork stirfry
directions: (1) Prepped meat. (2) Sauce. (3) Ginger, garilc, onion, green onion.
Ï†úÏú°Î≥∂Ïùå
Heat large skillet/pan on 4/10.
Add pork, gochujang, soy sauce, sugar, gochugaru, pepper, and sesame oil.
Stir to mix well. Cook for a few min, til pork is sauced well. Eventually get to ~7/10 heat.
Add garlic, ginger, onion, green onion.
Stir and cook for 12-15 min (can turn down heat a little if needed), til onion all cooked or pork fully cooked, juicy, little crispy.

name: galbitang

items.name: jalapeno
items.note: optional; just cut stem barely off (to prevent seeds falling out)

items.name: green onion
items.note: white part for soup, chop green for garnish

directions: Í∞àÎπÑÌÉï
In cold water, soak meat for 30 min to let blood out. Rinse with cold water.
In a pot, cover the meat with water just enough to cover, turn heat on to high, and stop just when water boils.
Throw the gross water away and rinse.
Put all ingredients in a big pot, add water, and boil everything on high heat 2+hr. Check occasionally to prevent overflow.
(Heat doesn't ultimately matter once it's boiling though; can set down to med heat after water starts boiling, probably after ~30min)
After 2+ hours (or whenever color looks right), remove onion and green onion, season with salt, add optional cooked glass noodles.

name: jat juk
directions: Ïû£Ï£Ω
Drain soaked rice. Blend with pine nuts and 1/2 c water 1-2 min til smooth.
Cook in pot with 2.5c more water on med high heat 5 min, stirring til thick.
Add salt and stir another min til semi-translucent.
Serve immediately while hot.

name: chicken porridge
directions: Îã≠Ï£Ω
Soak rice for 3 hours.
Boil all broth ingredients for 45min on med high (7/10) heat. Flip chicken, cook 30 more min, flip again, 30 more min until chicken cooked (on same heat).
Remove chicken from broth. (Safe internal temp for chicken: 165F) Remove onion from broth. Should be ~6 cups of broth
Remove bones from chicken. Shred meat.
In a pot, put in chicken, garlic, drained rice, and salt.
Cook ~1hr til water is mostly absorbed. First 30 min on med high, the rest of time on simmer. Stir occasionally.
Garnish with green onion.

name: spicy braised chicken

items.name: potato
items.note: up to 4; peeled, big 2" curry-style chunks

directions: (1) Pulverized onion + garlic, sauce. (2) Chicken + water in pot. (3) Potato. (4) Other veg.
Îã≠Î≥∂ÏùåÌÉï
Make sauce: pulverize onion and garlic. Mix with rest of sauce ingredients.
Add sauce to pot with chicken and water. Bring to boil med high.
When boiling, turn heat to med and add potatoes. Cover and cook for 15 min.
Add rest of vegetables. Cover and cook for 15 min until all soft.
If using glass noodle, add either very soaked noodles or boiled and rinsed noodles at the end.

name: dakgalbi

items.name: tteokbokki rice cake
items.note: sliced fine too. up to 8oz. soak in warm water for 10 min

directions: Îã≠Í∞àÎπÑ
(1) Marinated chicken. (2) Oil. (3) Sweet potato, carrot. (4) Cabbage. (5) Tteok (6) Perilla, green onion.
Make sauce. Marinate chicken 30min minimum. 4hrs-overnight ideal.
Large skillet, start with med low heat (4/10). Add oil and chicken, gently increase heat to med high (7/10), cook for 5 min.
Add sweet potato and carrot, cook for a few min. Add cabbage and cook til soft. Stir to prevent sticking. Add water to deglaze as you cook.
Add tteok, cover skillet, and cook on med heat (5/10) for 5 min.
Uncover, add perilla + scallion, stir, and continue to cook at med heat for 5 more min or til everything is cooked.

name: galbijjim

items.name: dried shiitake mushroom
items.note: soaked 4hr-overnight in cold water. big chunks

directions: Í∞àÎπÑÏ∞ú
(1) Sauce, meat. (2) Mushrooms, carrots, daikon.
In cold water, soak meat for 30 min to let blood out. Rinse with cold water.
Blend garlic, ginger, jalapeno, onion, kiwi. Mix in rest of sauce ingredients.
Place meat, sauce, and 1.5c of water in dutch oven. Boil over med heat (5/10) for 30 min covered.
Stir gently and flip the meat a bit. Reduce to med low (4/10) and continue to simmer covered 10 min.
Add mushrooms, carrots, daikon. Simmer covered med low (4/10) for 20 min.
Meat is now cooked but not tender. Simmer on med low (4/10) til tender (1hr. already reduced from 1.5hr, do NOT reduce further).
Once meat is tender, if sauce needs to be reduced, turn heat to med (5/10) and boil 30min uncovered, stirring.

name: spicy cod
directions: (1) Cod, salt, pepper, flour. (2) Onion, garlic, kelp. (3) Soy sauce, gochugaru, water. (4) Green onion, jalapeno.
ÎåÄÍµ¨ÏÇ¥Ï°∞Î¶º
Season cod with salt + pepper. Let sit for 30 min in fridge. Coat cod in flour.
On the bottom of a small pan, spread onion, garlic, kelp. Soy sauce and gochugaru on top. Add water.
Cook over med high heat 3min until boiling.
Reduce heat to medium. Stir. Add cod on top. Cover and cook 5 min med heat.
Uncover. Flip cod pieces over. Add green onion and jalapeno. Cover and cook 5 more min.
Open up and spoon some sauce onto top of cod. Serve.

name: doenjangguk
directions: ÎêúÏû•Íµ≠
Bring water/stock, soybean paste, gochujang, garlic to boil, med high-high heat.
Once boiling, reduce to medium. Add potatoes (note, will take 8-10 min to soften).
Add onion and zucchini, cook for 2-3 min.
Add tofu, 1-2 more min. Add mushroom, 1-2 more min.

name: miyeokguk

items.name: beef chuck stew
items.note: can also use brisket, stew, or round

directions: ÎØ∏Ïó≠Íµ≠
Soak miyeok 30-40min (til soft and hydrated). Drain and cut to bite-size.
Cut beef into bite-size pieces.
Heat sesame oil on pot, med high heat. Saute beef and miyeok, 3-5min.
Add water, salt, soy sauce, garlic/perilla powder if using. Stir and bring to boil.
Once boiling, lower heat to med or med low. Cook covered 20-30 min.
The longer you cook the better. Add water/seasoning to taste as you cook.

name: tteokguk

items.name: beef chuck stew
items.note: or flank steak or brisket; small pieces

items.name: gim
items.note: crushed or cut to thin strips

directions: Îñ°Íµ≠
Bring water to a boil in a heavy pot over high heat. Add beef and garlic, cook 5 min.
Turn heat down to med, cover, and cook for 20-25 min til beef is tender.
Add rice cakes, soup soy sauce, salt, pepper, sesame oil. Cook 7-8 min til rice cakes are soft.
Gently fry egg, slice into thin slices.
Serve and add garnish.

name: sujebi
directions: ÏàòÏ†úÎπÑ
Knead dough til smooth (10-15min) and let rest at least 1 hr. The longer the better.
Kelp, anchovy, green onion white part (opt), water, med high heat for 10 min. Remove and set aside kelp. Boil 10 more min, remove everyone.
Cut kelp into bite size pieces.
Add potato. Boil 5 min med high heat.
Add onion, zucchini, carrot, garlic, kelp, fish sauce, soup soy sauce, salt. Cook veg for 10 min.
Tear dough thinly into boiling water.
Close lid and cook for a couple min til dough floating.
Add green onion green part and sesame oil at the end.

name: chamchi jjigae
directions: Ï∞∏ÏπòÏ∞åÍ∞ú
Onion, tuna, gochujang, gochugaru, soy sauce, 1.5c water in smallish pot. Cover lid, cook 10 min med high heat.
Open and stir to mix. Stir in garlic, green onion. Let cook uncovered another 3-5 min to thicken.

name: kimchi jjigae
directions: ÍπÄÏπòÏ∞åÍ∞ú
Stir fry onion, pork belly, kimchi on med heat.
Add everything else and cook til satisfied.

name: budae jjigae
directions: Î∂ÄÎåÄÏ∞åÍ∞ú
(1) Stock. (2) Onion, green onion, mushroom. (3) Kimchi, seasoning paste. (4) Spam, sausage, rice cake, tofu.
Combine stock ingredients in large pot. Cover and cook 25min med high heat. Toss anchovies and kelp. Cut mushroom into bite size and set aside.
Mix seasoning paste ingredients together.
In a shallow pot (or big stainless pan), layer onion, green onion, mushroom. On top, add kimchi, seasoning paste, then spam, sausage, rice cake, tofu. Pour in the stock.
Cook over med high heat. When starts boiling (~10 min later), stir and turn ingredients over gently to allow even heating. Serve once noodles (if added) are softened.

name: easy kongbiji jjigae
directions: ÏΩ©ÎπÑÏßÄÏ∞åÍ∞ú
(1) Anchovy stock. (2) Blanched napa. (3) Oil, pork. (4) Seasoning paste. (5) Ground soybean.
Rinse + soak 1c dried soy beans for 6hrs-overnight. Rub beans to remove skins as much as possible.
Finely grind soaked beans in water til creamy.
Blanch napa. Tear, set aside.
Make anchovy stock by combining soup base ingredients. Bring to boil, cook 10 min.
In large tall pot, stir fry napa with pork on med heat.
Add anchovy stock and seasoning paste. Bring to boil, cook on med high for 5 min.
Add ground soybeans. Simmer uncovered 15min, stirring a few times. Stir in green onion in the last 2-3 min.

name: kongbiji jjigae
directions: ÏΩ©ÎπÑÏßÄÏ∞åÍ∞ú
(1) Soy beans. (2) Meat, onion, green onion white part, ginger, soup soy sauce, water. (3) Kimchi, garlic, gochugaru, salt, pepper.
Rinse + soak 1c dried soy beans for 6hrs-overnight. Rub beans to remove skins as much as possible.
Finely grind soaked beans in water til creamy.
In large tall pot, place ribs, onion, green onion white part, ginger, soup soy sauce, water. Bring to boil.
Skim off scum. Reduce heat to med-low. Cover and cook til meat is tender (25-30min). Remove veggies.
Add kimchi (or blanched napa), some kimchi juice, garlic, and seasonings. Bring to boil on med-high, then cook for 5min.
Add ground soybeans. Simmer uncovered 15min, stirring a few times. Stir in green onion in the last 2-3 min.

name: soondubu juk
directions: ÏàúÎëêÎ∂Ä Ï£Ω
(1) Soup base. (2) Cooked rice. (3) Egg. (4) Tofu, crab. (5) Salt, sesame oil.
In pot, water, anchovy, dashima. Bring pot to boil, reduce meat to med, then boil for 5min. Remove dashima + anchovy.
Add cooked rice and mix til broth thickened.
Add egg and stir in extremely quickly.
Add tofu and shredded crab and cook for 2 more min. Season with salt and sesame oil. Optional garnish with green onion

name: deulkkae soondubu jjigae
directions: Îì§Íªò ÏàúÎëêÎ∂ÄÏ∞åÍ∞ú
(1) Soup base. (2) Tofu, garlic, soup soy sauce, black pepper. (3) Deulkkae. (4) Perilla oil, green onion.
In pot, water, mushroom, dashima. Let sit for 10 min. Bring pot to boil, reduce meat to med, then boil for 5-7min.
Remove dashima + mushroom. Slice mushroom and return to pot.
Add tofu, garlic, soup soy sauce, pepper to pot. Bring to boil over med heat, then cook for 4 min.
Stir in perilla seeds, then boil for another min.
Drizzle sesame/perilla oil over stew, then garnish with green onion.

name: kongguksu
directions: ÏΩ©Íµ≠Ïàò
Wash and soak beans overnight. Strain and cook in 2 cup water, 15 min med high heat uncovered then covered simmering 5 min low heat.
Remove beans from heat. Uncover, stir, cool down for 10 min.
Blend beans, nuts, sesame seeds, 2 cup of cold new water. Blend high speed til smooth and creamy. Refrigerate up to 24 hr.
Make noodles. Rinse in cold water. Put the noodles into bowls.
Get soy milk from fridge. Add salt to taste. Pour soy milk on noodles. Add cucumber, egg, tomato on top.

name: easy kongguksu
directions: ÏΩ©Íµ≠Ïàò
Blend all fake soy milk ingredients EXCEPT water.

Start with half the tofu, all the sesame seeds, and some soy milk. Blend well til sesame seeds all crushed. Add rest of tofu and a bit more soy milk, blend again til smooth. Add rest of soy milk and blend til smooth.
Divide milk out into bowls.
Pour all the water into the blender, rinse out the blender, and pour the water into the bowls on top of the soy milk. Mix the contents of all bowls. Cover and chill the bowls.
Make noodles. Rinse in cold water. Put the noodles into bowls. Add cucumber, egg, optional tomato on top.

name: memil guksu

ingredients.category: tsuyu sauce substitute. maybe try a squeeze of lime juice

items.name: water
items.note: up to in order to water down?

directions: Î©îÎ∞Ä Íµ≠Ïàò
Cook soba noodles. Drain and rinse.
Per person: A bowl of chilled maybe even icy sauce, a pile of grated radish, seaweed, and noodle.
To eat, put sauce in bowl, add a little bit of radish and seaweed and noodle per bite.

name: janchi guksu
directions: ÏûîÏπòÍµ≠Ïàò
Prepare all garnishes.
Make broth: Large pot with water, onion, green onion kelp. Cover and cook over med high 30 min. Then, turn down to low and boil another 20 min.
Strain. Add soup soy sauce to broth.
Cook noodles. Drain and rinse.
Serve noodles. Pour warm broth over noodles. Place garnishes on top.

name: bossam
directions: Î≥¥Ïåà
In big pot, bring water and all the suyuk brine ingredients to boil over med high heat. Let boil 5 min.
Add pork, bring to boil, let boil 5 min uncovered.
Reduce heat to med and cook covered til very tender. (30min for 1lb, 45-50min for 2.5lb).
Turn heat off and let meat cool in brine to keep moist. Slice thin and serve.
For lunch, reheat strained brine and serve with noodles.

name: spam and bean rice
directions: Soak beans overnight. Rinse in cold water and drain 2 times.
Wash and rinse and place white rice in rice cooker as normal.
Place drained beans on top and cook as normal.

name: buchimgae
directions: Î∂ÄÏπ®Í∞ú
Med to med high heat. 1 big pancake, or  1/2 generous cup of batter + 1 tsp oil per pancake.

name: advanced buchimgae

items.name: water
items.note: very cold; aiming for 1:1.5 ratio dry to water

directions: Î∂ÄÏπ®Í∞ú
Med to med high heat. 1 big pancake, or  1/2 generous cup of batter + 1 tsp oil per pancake.

name: gyeranjjim
directions: Í≥ÑÎûÄÏ∞ú
Whisk egg, water, shrimp. Pour into ramekins
Fill water up to half ramekin height. Bring to boil.
Put in ramekins, set to med low heat for 8 min.
Stir, add gochugaru, and keep on for 5ish more min (until set)
Microwave version:
WHisk all in microwavable bowl. Cover with cling wrap and either poke holes or leave a little opening on the side.
Microwave for 2 min. (Try stopping microwave halfway and stirring and resuming?)

name: microwave gyeranjjim
directions: Í≥ÑÎûÄÏ∞ú
Whisk egg, salt, fish sauce, mirin.
Add equal amount stock to egg mix amount (should be ~200ml).
Pour into microwavable bowl. Strain if you want very smooth. Stir in green onion if using.
Cover with plastic wrap, but poke some small holes on top. Microwave for 5 min.

name: silky microwave steamed egg
directions: Í≥ÑÎûÄÏ∞ú
Whisk egg, warm stock, salt. Strain into microwaveable bowl and spoon out any bubbles on surface.
Plastic wrap and poke a few holes on top.
Cook time depends on microwave. Test with 80% power for 2 min at first

name: soy sauce egg
directions: Soft boil eggs. (Place in boiling water for 7-8ish min).
Put eggs in sauce, try to get all covered. Soak overnight. Eat within 5 days.

name: rolled egg
directions: Í≥ÑÎûÄÎßàÎ¶¨
Beat eggs, add filling.
On med low heat (smaller pan for thicker roll!), add oil, add 1/2 of egg mix and swirl to cover pan.
Cook until bottom is done, until top is set but wet.
Fold over a bit of one side (~1 inch). Fold over again.
Move the folded side to the edge, add rest of egg mix to open space on pan.
Fold over again once the newly added mix is similarly set but wet. Remove from heat, let cool, then slice.

name: saengseon jeon
directions: (1) Sliced fish. (2) Salt, pepper, flour. (3) Egg, green onion, salt.
ÏÉùÏÑ†Ï†Ñ. ÎèôÌÉúÏ†Ñ = pollock, ÎåÄÍµ¨Ï†Ñ = cod. FISH NUGGETS
If frozen, bring fish out in room temp for 20 min. Thinly slice.
Mix salt, pepper, flour. Lightly coat fish in mix.
Beat eggs + chopped green onion + salt.
Normally you dip one piece at a time, but for ease, put all the fish pieces for one batch into egg at once.
Pan + oil (1 tbsp per batch?) on med heat. Place each eggy fish piece on pan. Cook 1 min each side.

name: dotori muk muchim
directions: ÎèÑÌÜ†Î¶¨Î¨µÎ¨¥Ïπ®
Combine all muk ingredients well, no lumps. Stir over med heat 7-8 min til mixture bubbles. Lower heat and stir another 5 min.
Pour mix into glass container. Let cool. Put in fridge for 4-7 hrs til solid.
Turn glass container upside down onto cutting board. Slice.
Mix sauce ingredients. Mix salad ingredients and sauce. Add sliced muk and toss gently. Garnish with sesame seed.
Muk lasts in fridge 4-6 days.

name: bastardized muk salad
directions: Combine all muk ingredients well, no lumps. Stir over med heat 7-8 min til mixture bubbles. Lower heat and stir another 5 min.
Pour mix into glass container. Let cool. Put in fridge for 4-7 hrs til solid.
Turn glass container upside down onto cutting board. Slice.
Mix sauce ingredients. Mix salad ingredients and sauce. Add sliced muk and toss gently. Garnish with sesame seed.
Muk lasts in fridge 4-6 days.

name: kimchi
directions: ÍπÄÏπò
Chop napa into bite size pieces.
Soak in salt water for at least 2 hrs. Should be limp!
Drain and rinse cabbage a few times.
Toss with sauce. Use about 1/8c more water to rinse out the sauce bowl and add to kimchi.

name: radish kimchi
directions: ÍπçÎëêÍ∏∞
Cut radish. Rinse and dry.
Toss in salt and sugar. Let sit for 30 min.
Mix sauce ingredients with 1/3 cup of the juice from the drained radish.

name: lotus root jorim

items.name: honey
items.note: or sugar. to sub for 3/4c rice syrup?

directions: Ïó∞Í∑ºÏ°∞Î¶º
Slice lotus roots into 1/4 inch thick discs. Soak in cold water for 30 min.
Boil water in a pot, add vinegar, and blanch lotus root for 5 min, uncovered. Rinse in cold water and strain.
Heat up oil in a pot. Med heat? Stir fry the roots for a few min til softer and translucent.
Add water, garlic, soy sauce. Stir and cover, heat to low, cook for 40 min. Occasionally open cover to turn roots over for even cooking. Add more water if necessary.
Add sweetener and stir. Cover and simmer for another 20 min.
Open and turn heat to med high. Carefully stir and turn over roots, braise til almost all liquid evaporated and roots are jelly like (~30min??).
Remove from heat, stir in sesame oil, sprinkle with sesame seeds. Can store in fridge for up to 2 weeks.

name: soybean sprout muchim
directions: ÏΩ©ÎÇòÎ¨ºÎ¨¥Ïπ®
Rinse sprouts in cold water, remove rotten beans or floating skins.
Place 1 cup water + bean sprouts in medium pot. Cover, bring to boil over high heat, cook for 3-4 min and DO NOT open lid.
Drain quickly, cool. Shock sprouts in cold water. Toss with remaining ingredients.

name: seaweed muchim

items.name: cucumber
items.note: optional, thinly sliced. can also do radish

directions: ÎØ∏Ïó≠Î¨¥Ïπ®
Soak miyeok in cold water (prob 10-12 min, check package) or just til soft. Rinse, drain, and cut. Blanch miyeok in boiling water, drain and rinse and cool and squeeze out water.
Mix all sauce ingredients. Toss all ingredients.

name: cucumber kimchi

items.name: salt
items.note: coarse salt; use less if table salt

directions: Ïò§Ïù¥ÍπÄÏπò
Quarter cucumber and cut to 1.5" long pieces. Salt evenly and let sit ~30min.
Drain cucumbers but do not rinse. Add 1/4 of a thinly sliced onion (optional) and chives. Toss well in seasoning.

name: cucumber muchim
directions: Ïò§Ïù¥Î¨¥Ïπ®
Toss cucumbers gently in salt. Let sit 15 min.
Drain excess water but don't squeeze hard. Mix well with all remaining ingredients.

name: sweet potato stem namul
directions: Í±¥Í≥†Íµ¨ÎßàÏàúÎÇòÎ¨º
Soak stems til soft (6hrs-overnight). Cut into bite size length, strain.
Fry up on med heat. Add garlic, cook til garlic soft.
Add sauce, saute a bit. Add water a little and let boil.
Add green onions, saute. Add perilla powder + sesame seeds at end.
Universal namul recipe!:
For ~300g dried namul, 1 tbsp oil, 1 minced garlic, 2 tbsp sesame oil, 2 tbsp soy sauce, green onion.

name: gosari namul
directions: Í≥†ÏÇ¨Î¶¨ÎÇòÎ¨º
In medium pot, gosari and 4-5 cup water. Boil covered over med heat til tender (~30-40min). Turn heat off and let cool in cooking water. Rinse in cold water and drain.
Cut into 3-4" pieces. Remove tough stem ends if needed.
Mix gosari with soy sauce, sugar, garlic. Let sit 10 min.
Saute in skillet with 1 tbsp oil for 4-5 min med heat. Pour in water/broth, cook for few more min stirring occasionally til water mostly gone.
Add rest of ingredients. Stir well. Take off heat.

name: spinach namul

items.name: soup soy sauce
items.note: or 2 tsp gochujang + 2 tsp soy sauce

directions: ÏãúÍ∏àÏπòÎÇòÎ¨º
Rinse spinach. Blanch in salted boiling water til wilted (20-30sec). Quickly remove and shock in icy cold water.
Drain and squeeze excess water gently. Cut into 3" length
Toss and mix well with rest of ingredients.
Store 3-4 days in fridge.

name: peanut jorim
directions: ÎïÖÏΩ©Ï°∞Î¶º
Bring peanuts + 2 cup water to a boil. Boil for 5 min. Drain.
Return peanuts to pot. Add soy sauce, mirin, sugar, corn syrup, water/broth.
Bring to boil. Reduce meat to med and gently boil uncovered til most sauce evaporated (~20-25min).
Stir occasionally but monitor to prevent burning. Sprinkle with sesame seeds.
Keep in fridge up to 2-3 weeks.

name: potato jorim
directions: (1) Potatoes + carrots. (2) Sauce. (3) Onion. (4) Peppers.
Í∞êÏûêÏ°∞Î¶º
Cut potatoes into 1" cubes. Cut other veg into big chunks.
Mix all braising ingredients except sesame seeds, stir well
In non-stick pan/pot, saute potatoes + carrots over med heat 4-5 min, stir occasionally.
Add sauce and bring to boil over high heat. Add onion.
Cover, reduce heat to med, cook till potatoes almost cooked thru (~5 min), firm but not mushy.
Stir in peppers. Boil uncovered til sauce reduced and thick (~3min). Garnish with sesame seeds.
Keeps in fridge 2-3 days.

name: parsnip jorim
directions: Slice parsnips into thick flat slices, then pound flat (being careful not to break them apart)
Fry on nonstick pan low heat lightly with sesame oil til golden.
Pour in sauce and cook for a few more min on low heat.

name: eomuk bokkeum
directions: (1) Sliced veg. (2) Fish cake. (3) Sauce.
Ïñ¥Î¨µ Î≥∂Ïùå
Thinly slice veg. Combine and mix all sauce ingredients well.
Non stick pan on med high heat, cook veg for 1-2 min or til silghtly soft.
Reduce heat to med, cook fish cake ~2 min. Stir in sauce well, cook ~2 min.
Veg options are to liking--can do green onions, chili peppers, etc
Keep 4-5 days in fridge.

name: steamed shishito
directions: ÍΩàÎ¶¨Í≥†Ï∂îÏ∞ú
Trim, rinse, and drain peppers. Toss peppers in flour to coat.
Bring water in steamer to "high simmer." Add peppers, cover, and steam for ~5 min or til tender. Don't overcook or will get mushy!
Toss peppers in sauce.
Keeps for few days in fridge.

name: myulchi bokkeum
directions: Î©∏Ïπò
Cook anchovies 2-3 min over med heat in pan with oil. Turn off heat. Set anchovies aside on plate.
Mix well all sauce ingredients except sesame oil and seeds. Pour into pan you were using, and boil over med heat til bubbly and silghtly thick (~2-3min).
Add anchovies back in and optional jalapeno. Stir well til anchovies coated well. Garnish with sesame oil and sesame seeds.
Keeps in fridge up to a week.

name: kung pao
directions: Marinate, cook high heat, and set aside protein.
1 tsp oil into wok med heat, cook scallions, ginger, and garlic with the peppercorn powder on low. Cook for 1-2 min.
Add protein back in. Turn heat up and stir fry with the sauce for 1 min. Add peanuts, stir quick, and serve.

name: broccoli tofu stirfry
directions: Marinate protein.
Fry tofu if using: Med heat, 1 tbsp oil, about 5 min per side. Set aside. (Don't really need to make too crispy.. it'll get soaked in sauce anyway)
Wok med heat, cook garlic in 1 tsp oil for 30 sec.
Add broccoli, cook for 30 sec. Add wine around edge of wok.
Add tofu and sauce and walnuts.

name: chili oil
directions: Keep at 225-250F for 30 min. Pour over gochugaru.
Makes 1.5 cups of oil? Store in fridge for 6 months.
Makes 393g of oil (7-8g per tbsp. ~50 tbsp total)

name: dan bing
directions: Makes 3 pancakes
Mix flour, salt, water with spatula until sticky dough forms, ~2-3 min.
Coat dough with 3/4 tsp veg oil. Cover with plastic wrap. Rest for 1 hr.
Roll out with rolling pin into almost translucent.
Heat skillet or frying pan over med high heat.
Add 1/2 tsp oil. Lift rolled out dough, place evenly in pan.
Crack 1 egg into center of dough. Lightly spread egg around over top of dough.
Drizzle another 1/2 tsp oil on top.
Flip and cook this for 10 sec.
Flip again. Let cook for another min or until golden brown.
Roll each pancake up, slice the rolls, and top with sauce.

name: mapo tofu
directions: (1) Peppercorn, ginger, garlic. (2) Pork. (3) The beans. (4) Cornstarch. (5) Chili oil. (6) Tofu.
Heat oil on wok, med heat.
Add ground peppercorns and stir occasionally for 30 sec. Add ginger. After 1 min, add garlic.
After 1 min, turn heat to high and add ground pork. Fry til cooked thru.
Add spicy bean sauce, stir in well. Add beans and cook for 30 sec.
Add 2/3 c water and stir. Simmer for 1 min.
Mix cornstarch with 1/4 c water. Add mix to sauce and stir.
Add chili oil, stir, and add tofu. Cook for 3-5 min.

name: mapo rice cakes
directions: (1) Peppercorn, ginger, garlic. (2) Pork. (3) The beans. (4) Rice cakes. (5) Tofu, green onion.
Heat oil on wok, med heat. Add aromatics. Cook for 2 min.
After 2 min, turn heat to high and add ground pork. Fry til cooked thru.
Add spicy bean sauce, stir in well. Add beans and cook for 30 sec.
Turn heat down to med. Add rice cakes, stir and cook til soft. While cooking, use up to 1/4c water to deglaze as needed.
Add tofu and cook and gently stir til all combined. Garnish with sliced green onion.

name: chicken black bean stirfry
directions: Marinate chicken.
2 tbsp oil on med heat. Cook beans, garlic, chicken til chicken is opaque.
Add veg and stir fry for 1 min.
Add sugar, ginger powder, wine, salt. Stir fry.

name: cumin lamb

items.name: oil
items.note: optional if lamb is a fattier cut

directions: Cut lamb. Marinate for 30min.
Dry toast cumin seeds on med heat. Set aside.
High heat wok. Once hot, 2 tbsp oil and lamb.
Sear meat until crispy and brown.
Add rest of ingredients and toss til just combined (greens will be wilted). Serve.

name: eggplant with garlic sauce
directions: (1) Eggplants. (2) Pork. (3) Ginger, garlic. (4) Sauce.
Cut eggplants. Soak fully submerged in salt water for 15 min. Drain and pat dry.
Coat eggplants in cornstarch by hand.
1 tbsp oil in nonstick skillet med high heat. Spread eggplants without overlap. (if at any point, too smokey, turn to med heat)
Cook eggplants one side at a time til charred and soft (~8-10min total). Transfer eggplants to plate.
Remaining oil, cook pork for til MOSTLY not pink. Add garlic and ginger and cook til soft.
Add all eggplants back, pour sauce over, quickly stir a few times til all coated and sauce is thick.

name: tomato egg
directions: (1) Whisked egg, salt, pepper, sesame oil, shaoxing. (2) Cut tomatoes, chopped scallions. (3) Sugar, salt, water.
Wok on med high heat (7/10) til just smoking.
2 tbsp oil and immediately add egg. Scramble and immediately remove. Set aside.
1 tbsp oil, wok to high heat (8/10), add tomatoes and scallions. Stir fry for a min.
Add sugar, salt, water. Add cooked eggs. Mix everything, cover and cook 1-2 min til tomatoes soft.
Uncover. Stir fry til sauce is thickened/water is reduced to liking.

name: lunch tomato egg
directions: (1) Whisked egg, salt, pepper, sesame oil, shaoxing. (2) Cut tomatoes, chopped scallions. (3) Sugar, salt, water.
Wok on med high heat (7/10) til just smoking.
2 tbsp oil and immediately add egg. Scramble and immediately remove. Set aside.
1 tbsp oil, wok to high heat (8/10), add tomatoes and scallions. Stir fry for a min.
Add sugar, salt, water. Add cooked eggs. Mix everything, cover and cook 1-2 min til tomatoes soft.
Uncover. Stir fry til sauce is thickened/water is reduced to liking.

name: mongolian beef
directions: (1) Marinated beef. (2) Ginger, garlic, chili pepper. (3) Hot water, soy sauce, sugar. (4) Cornstarch slurry. (5) Green onion.
Marinate beef for 1hr in oil, soy sauce, cornstarch, water.
Lightly coat beef in cornstarch.
Wok high heat. Spread half the beef evenly in wok, sear beef for 1 min, then 30 sec on other side. Set to side, try to let oil drain. Cook the other half.
Drain oil from wok, leave 1 tbsp behind. Turn heat to med-high. Add ginger and dried peppers, if using, and garlic after 15 sec.
After 10 sec, add water, soy sauce, sugar
Bring sauce to a simmer, let simmer for ~2min and slowly stir in cornstarch slurry until the sauce coats back of spoon.

Add beef and green onions. Toss everything together for 30 sec. Should be almost no liquid, sauce should be clinging to the beef. If you still have sauce, increase the heat slightly and stir until thickened.

name: gai lan with oyster sauce
directions: Clean gai lan well. If any stems are very thick, cut lengthwise to make thinner.
Put 8 cup already boiling water, olive oil, and salt in pot on high heat.
Wait for water to boil again. Once boiling, add gai lan (should be submerged!), cover.
Let water come back to boil. Once boiling again, flip gai lan, then cook 1-2 more min covered.
If you want softer, can add another 1-3 min of cooking.
Transfer gai lan to plate, make 1-2 cuts along stems, drizzle with oyster sauce and more olive oil to taste.

name: pork belly cabbage dry stirfry

items.name: gochugaru
items.note: to sub 5 roughly chopped dried chili peppers

items.name: balsamic vinegar
items.note: optional; to sub chinese black vinegar

directions: (1) Oil, meat. (2) Garlic, ginger, chilies, green onion. (3) Cabbage, wine, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, water. (4) Vinegar.
Chop cabbage into bite size pieces. Wash and THOROUGHLY dry.
Wok on high heat. Add oil. Sear meat til caramelized (1 min???)
Heat to medium. Add aromatics (garlic, chilies, ginger, scallion), stir-fry for a min.
Add cabbage, wine, soy sauce, oyster sauce, sugar, and 1 tbsp water. Heat to high, cover, cook for 1-2min.
Uncover, stir in the black vinegar and salt to taste

name: chicken cabbage stirfry

items.name: balsamic vinegar
items.note: optional; to sub chinese black vinegar

directions: (1) Oil, meat. (2) Aromatics. (3) Cabbage, sauce. (4) Vinegar, gochugaru.
Chop cabbage into bite size pieces. Wash and dry.
Wok on high heat. Add oil. Sear chicken til caramelized (1 min???). Will be watery, but that's ok.
Heat to medium. Add aromatics, stir-fry for a min.
Add sauce and stir. Add cabbage and stir carefully. Heat to high, cover, cook for 2min.
Uncover, stir in the black vinegar. Cook for 1 more min.

name: winter melon soup
directions: (1) Meatball sauce. (2) Meat. (3) Oil, green onion. (4) Winter melon, water, chicken broth. (5) Black pepper, sesame oil, salt.
Make meatball sauce. Mash pork a little in large bowl, then add sauce, then whip vigorously, in one circular direction, ~10+min
Whip til thick and pasty.
Shape meatballs with oiled palms. Golf ball size. Chill on oiled plate while prepping soup.
Soak glass noodles, cold water 15 min. Drain, cut in half lengthwise.
Quarter winter melon, like a watermelon. Cut off outer 1/8 inch of dark green skin. Rinse, chop into 1/4 inch thick chunks.
In pot on med heat, add oil. Cook white part of green onion 1 min.
Add winter melon. Pour in chicken stock + water. Increase heat and bring to boil.
When boiling, carefully lower meatballs in using spoon.
Add pepper and sesame oil. Bring to boil again.
Add noodles, stir. Salt to taste. Boil for another 3-4 min, garnish with cilantro.

name: vegetable stirfry with white sauce
directions: (1) Sauce. (2) All vegetables but peas. (3) Peas
Blanch sliced lotus root in boiling water for 45 sec. Drain and set aside.
Mix all sauce ingredients. Set aside.
Heat wok on med heat. Add oil. (When hot, cook 1lb chicken breast sliced thin 2-3min. Set aside.)
Add all vegetables but peas, stir fry 2-3 min, while gradually increasing heat to med high.
Add peas, cook another minute. (Add chicken back in now, and water chestnuts if using)
Add sauce to pan. Toss to combine, cook til sauce thick and clear. (Should take 1-2 min)

name: braised turnip

items.name: dried shiitake mushroom
items.note: soaked 2hr-overnight in hot water. big chunks

directions: (1) Oil, star anise, peppercorn. (2) Ginger, garlic, white part of scallion. (3) Meat. (4) Turnip, mushroom. (5) Sauce. (6) Cornstarch mix, green onion.
Heat oil in wok low heat. Add star anise and peppercorns. Let infuse the oil for 10 min (careful not to burn)
Scoop out and discard the aromatics, leaving oil in wok.
Add ginger, garlic, and white parts of scallion. Turn up heat to med-high, stir fry 1-2 min.
Add ground meat, and stir-fry til browned.
Add turnips and mushrooms. Stir and mix everything well.
Mix sauce ingredients well. Add to wok, cover, and let simmer for 15 min med heat. Turnips should be cooked thru and translucent.
Once turnips fully cooked, uncover, turn heat up to high, add cornstarch mix. Stir-fry for a min to thicken. Stir in green parts of scallions and serve.

name: shrimp with black bean sauce
directions: (1) Ground pork. (2) Oil, garlic, ginger, bell pepper, douchi. (3) Shrimp, shaoxing. (4) Sauce. (5) Cornstarch. (6) Egg. (7) Scallion.
Bring 4 to 5 cups of water to a boil in your wok. Stir in ground pork, breaking up clumps, cook for about 1 min, til no longer pink. Rinse and strain.
Wok med high heat. Add oil, garlic, ginger, bell pepper, douchi, pork. Stir-fry 20 sec.
Add shrimp. Pour Shaoxing around hot sides of wok. Stir-fry 20 sec.
Stir sauce mixture well, pour into wok. Bring to simmer, then gradually stir in cornstarch mix as needed til thickened to liking.
Pour egg across surface of the sauce. Simmer for 10 sec to set egg, then use spatula to fold egg into sauce with a few strokes. Fold in scallion, serve.

name: rou zao fan
directions: (1) Ginger, shallot. (2) Mushroom. (3) Pork, star anise. (4) Shaoxing. (5) Sauce, water. (6) Eggs. (7) Green onion.
Rehydrate mushrooms. Reserve soaking water (without sediments...). Squeeze mushrooms, dice into 1/4 inch pieces.
Wok med heat. Add 2 tbsp oil, cook ginger + shallot til shallots translucent (1-2 min).
Stir in mushrooms. Cook 2 min.
Heat to high. Add 1 tbsp oil, pork, star anise. Cook til meat opaque.
Stir in Shaoxing to deglaze. Add sauce and 2 cup water.
Bring to boil. Once boiling, cover, reduce heat to med, simmer for 20 min.
Meanwhile, hard-boil eggs (10 min in boiling water) and peel.
Once pork simmered for 20 min, add eggs. Make sure eggs are submerged. If not enough liquid to do so, add another 1/2-1 cup water.
Cover and simmer another 10 min.
Uncover. If sauce too thin, turn heat to med high and reduce, sitrring carefully to not break egg. Stir in green onion.

name: easy laghman

items.name: beef chuck stew
items.note: cubed or strips. any cut fine? bone-on is bonus

items.name: roma tomato
items.note: diced. can sub 1 tbsp tomato paste

items.name: daikon
items.note: to sub rutabaga. diced. celery even ok

items.name: balsamic vinegar
items.note: to sub black vinegar for garnish

directions: (1) Oil, meat. (2) Onion, garlic. (3) Tomato. (4) Rest of veg. (5) Spices + water. (6) Pasta. (7) Garnish.
In large pot, heat oil med-high heat.
Add beef, cook uncovered ~5min til browned.
Add onion + garlic, cook on med til soft.
Add tomatoes, cook 2 min, stirring as needed. Add rest of veg and saute a few min.
Add leftover bone from meat, if any, and spices. Pour water into pot, bring to a boil, then turn heat to low and simmer ~25-40min til meat tender and veg soft.
Remove bones, anise, and bay leaves.
Put cooked noodles in deep bowls, then top with soup and garnish.

name: pad see ew
directions: Soak noodles. Make sauce. Separate broccoli stems and leaves. Cut leaves into halves or thirds. Cut stems into bite size, thinner pieces.
Heat 1 tbsp oil in wok, high heat.
Add garlic, cook 15 sec. Add chicken, cook til mosty changed from pink to white.
Add broccoli stems, cook til chicken is almost cooked through.
Add broccoli leaves, cook ti just wilted.
Push everything to one side, crack egg in and scramble. Remove everything onto a plate.
Heat another 1 tbsp on high heat.
Add noodles, let crisp. Add sauce. Toss together. Add chicken and broccoli back in, toss, serve.

name: pad thai
directions: Boil noodles. Rinse under cold water.
Mix fish sauce, sugar, rice vinegar, water, chili powder.
Heat skillet, add oil, cook garlic.
Cook tofu, add noodles, cook for 30 seconds.
Cook egg, add sauce.
Stir in peanut.

name: pad kra pao

items.name: jalapeno
items.note: deseeded, thinly sliced. to sub Thai bird chilies

directions: (1) Shallots, garlic. (2) Chilies. (3) Pork. (4) Sauce. (5) Water. (6) Basil.
Wok med high heat. Add oil, shallots and garlic. Fry 3 min.
Add chilies, cook 1min.
Heat to high. Add pork, breaking it up.
Add sauce. Fry another min. Deglaze with water, which will cook off very fast from the high heat.
Add basil. Stir fry til wilted.

name: summer rolls
directions: Wet rice papers in hot water to soften. Fill and roll.

name: kmg summer rolls
directions: Bring water to boil. Cook chicken (30min?). Shred or divide into pieces.
(If making side soup, in remaining chicken water, cook 1 cubed daikon/winter melon til soft.)
Toast garlic in saucepan til softened. Mix all sauce ingredients together and add to saucepan.
Cook sauce a little bit. Add mashed ginger to sauce and let cool.
Wet rice papers in hot water to soften. Fill and roll. Serve with sauce and soup!

name: khao man gai
directions: Poached chicken:
Take chicken out of fridge 30min before cooking.
Fill large saucepan with water (about 6c for 1.5lb chicken) + flavorings so that chicken will be submerged under 2 inches of water.
Bring water to boil. Place chicken in water. Cover.
Bring back up to boil, then IMMEDIATELY move saucepan off heat. Set it aside for 30min (up to 45min ok, up to 1hr acceptable).
Remove chicken from water. Slice or shred.
Sauce:
Toast garlic in saucepan til softened. Mix all sauce ingredients together and add to saucepan.
Cook sauce a little bit. Add mashed ginger to sauce and let cool.

name: thai curry
directions: Med heat, cook chicken + onion til chicken no longer pink.
Add paste and cook for few min. Pour in coconut milk + rest of veg.
Cover and simmer 15 min.
Uncover, add cornstarch slurry to thicken, cook 2 more min. Garnish and serve over rice.

name: chicken adobo
directions: Marinate chicken for at least 20 min (up to overnight).
Heat 1 tbsp oil on skillet over high heat.
Remove chicken from marinade (reserve marinade) and onto pan.
Sear both sides til brown (~1 min per side). Don't cook all the way through. Put chicken aside.
Heat remaining oil (or use chicken grease!), cook garlic and onion for 1.5 min.
Add marinade, water, sugar, black pepper. Bring it to simmer then turn heat down to med high. Simmer 5 min.
Add chicken smooth side down.
Simmer uncovered for 20~25 min (no need to stir), turning chicken at ~15 min, until sauce reduces down to thick jam-like syrup.

name: vietnamese bun
directions: Marinate chicken for 30min-1hr.
Combine nuoc cham ingredients and stir until sugar completely dissolved. Adjust if desired.
Boil, drain, rinse vermicelli.
Heat 2 tbsp oil in skilllet, med high heat (6/10).
Sear chicken 3 min each side. Pour in marinade and some water, then cover and cook for 7-10 min on med low (4/10) heat. Set aside.
Slice chicken thighs and add to salad.
Combine all ingredients. Serve with nuoc cham sauce.
(Original chicken cooking instructions: 2 tbsp oil med high heat (8/10). Sear chicken for 3 min one side, 5 min other (or til cooked thru). Set aside.)

name: banh mi
directions: Toss carrot and radish with sugar, salt, vinegar. Set aside 1 hr, stir occasionally.
Marinate chicken 1-4 hrs.
Heat 2 tsp oil in skilllet, med high heat (6/10).
Sear chicken 3 min each side. Pour in marinade and some water, then cover and cook for 7-10 min on med low (4/10) heat.
Mix sauce. Assemble sandwich.

name: banh trang nurong
directions: Note: if rice paper is made of tapioca, and not rice, it may shatter and be difficult to cook/eat. Try wetting two pieces of rice paper and cook on pan to fuse. Else, just use the dry rice paper sheet.
Place rice paper on a dry nonstick or cast iron pan on low med (or med high???) heat.
Place green onion on top with well in center for egg. Either crack egg on top and swirl carefully, or spoon on beaten egg.
Let cook. Add sausage on top.
Squeeze over the top of the filling mayo and sriracha.
(Try to) fold over in half and cook til rice paper is crispy.
To cook sausage: put sausage in pot with enough water to cover. Bring water to boil, then continue cooking til easily pierced with chopstick (10-20min).

name: vague peanut butter flakes
directions: (1) Garlic, veg. (2) Egg. (3) Noodle, sauce. (4) Garnish.
Mix sauce ingredients.
Soak noodle in warm water.
Heat oil in skillet, high heat. Stir fry garlic and veg til softer. Crack in egg and scramble.
Add noodle and sauce. Stir fry for a bit.
Add garnish. Quickly cook, and serve.

name: california roll noodle
directions: Cook noodle. (If using dry udon, boil water on high? or any heat? Add noodle and cook in boiling water for 4 min, then drain.)
Cut vegetables. Add noodles. Toss in sugar, salt, and a splash of rice vinegar. Combine

name: bean and hogao tacos

items.name: paprika
items.note: or turmeric/saffron. to sub ground annatto

directions: Hogao:
In small saucepan, cook all hogao ingredients plus the Sazon over med-low heat 10-15min stirring often. Remove from heat, set aside.
Tortillas:
Mix dry in a bowl. Stir in wet. Mix, then knead til smooth.
Separate into 9 balls, lightly flatten with palm. Cover and let rest 15min to up to 2 hrs.
Nonstick pan on med heat. (Maybe try slightly above med heat?)
Flatten each ball with rolling pin. Should be pretty thin and translucent!
Heat each tortilla. First side for 1 min (should have lightly browned spots. if not, heat is too low. if it takes less than 1 min, heat is too high). Other side for 15-30 sec.
Keep warm til ready to serve. Store room temp for 24hrs or fridge for up to 1 week.

name: stuffing
directions: Add 2 tbsp olive oil on nonstick pan, med heat. Add vegetables, black pepper, parsley, and salt. Cook vegetables until soft.
Add bread. Mix and add 1.5c water, soy sauce, and spices.
Turn heat to low and let cook until bread soft and water dissolved.

name: chickpea tuna salad
directions: Drain, rinse, and mash chickpeas.
Mix with everything.

name: tuna salad
directions: If using tuna in water, drain and mix in olive oil.
Mix ingredients and enjoy.

name: crab salad
directions: Mix. add chopped pickles if you want

name: egg salad
directions: Hard boil 5 eggs for 12 min. Separate yolk and white. Dice whites, mix yolk with all other ingredients, then mix all together.
Optionally, soft boil 3 eggs for 8 min.

name: hot egg sandwich
directions: Scramble eggs. Sandwich with mayo, tomato, and scrambled eggs.

name: steamed egg sandwich
directions: Dinner rolls:
Warm milk + water, yeast, sugar. Mix and let sit.
Mix flour, salt, and add wet. Mix til incorporated.
Add softened butter, knead til smooth and windowpane test.
Let double (~40min). Divide into pieces, let rest 15 min at room temp.
Deflate, knead, shape into 9 balls. Let rise ~30min.
Bake in buttered 8x8 dish at 355F 20-30 min or til lightly browned.
Mix milk, butter, water, sugar, salt til all blended.
Mix in flour and yeast. Let sit 5 min. Knead til silky (5min). Let rise.
Grease 8x8 baking dish.
Whisk eggs til just combined. Whisk in rest of ingredients til just combined.
Pour into dish. Cover tight with foil. Place dish inside 9x13 baking dish, pour water in big pan til just to top of the egg mix.
Bake at 325F til just set 35-40 min.

name: fancy salad
directions: Enjoy your FANCY salad

name: blintzes

items.name: farmers cheese
items.note: chilled. (this will be an entire 16oz WF container)

directions: Makes 16.
Whisk all pancake ingredients together til smooth and combined. Blender fine. Let rest covered room temp at least 1hr.
Mix zest, farmers cheese, sugar, egg, cream cheese, vanilla, salt and blend til light and smooth. (Keep in fridge til using)
8 inch nonstick pan. Grease with melted butter. Cook on medium heat. Add batter, tilting and swirling.
Cook just one side til top is matte and not shiny, lightly golden edges. (~1min?)
With cooked side facing up, fill with filling in the center (~4in long?). Fold bottom up, then the sides, then roll up.
(Freeze now if you want)
On nonstick med heat, grease with butter. Fry blintzes seam side down til golden (few min per side).
Serve with compote or honey.
To cook from frozen, put frozen onto buttered pan. Cover for a few min to steam, then cook uncovered.

name: syrniki

items.name: farmers cheese
items.note: (this will be an entire WF container)

directions: Beat egg and sugar until smooth.
Add rest of ingredients and mix.
Fry on med low heat (4/10). Makes 15 syrniki (~47g batter each). Use about 1 tsp per batch (2-3 batches).

name: pb banana smoothie
directions: Blend and enjoy.

name: other smoothies
directions: Blend and enjoy.

name: mango lassi
directions: Blend all. Serve chilled.

name: green and yogurt smoothies
directions: Blend and enjoy.

name: smoothie to try
directions: Blend and enjoy.

name: smoothie bowl
directions: Blend base ingredients with patience.

name: chocolate chia pudding
directions: for thick chia: 2 tbsp for every 1/2 c (4g chia for every 20ml milk)
for thinner chia: 3 tbsp for every 1 c (3g chia for every 20ml milk)

name: pb chia pudding
directions: for thick chia: 2 tbsp for every 1/2 c (4g chia for every 20ml milk)
for thinner chia: 3 tbsp for every 1 c (3g chia for every 20ml milk)

name: big sur chia pudding
directions: Prepare to be transported back to California

name: mango chia pudding
directions: Blend milk + mango. Stir with chia.

name: yogurt chia pudding
directions: Stir yogurt and honey. Stir in chia. Stir in milk. After 1 min of sitting, stir again.
Chill in fridge 1+hr before serving.

name: overnight oats
directions: Mix all. Let sit in fridge overnight. Keeps in fridge up to 5 days.

name: perilla overnight oats
directions: Mix all. Let sit in fridge overnight. Keeps in fridge up to 5 days.

name: bircher muesli
directions: Mix all. Optionally mix in grated/chopped apple.
Let sit in fridge overnight. Keeps in fridge up to 4 days.

name: vegan pancakes
directions: Mix dry ingredients. Separately mix wet and let sit to curdle.
Combine the two and mix, let sit for 5-15 min.
Cook 1/4 cup batter each over lightly oiled pan, med heat (5-6/10). Flip once top bubbles.

name: buttermilk pancakes
directions: Mix milk and vinegar and vanilla if using. Let curdle 5 min.
Sift dry ingredients. Whisk egg and butter into the buttermilk.
Make well in center of dry ingredients, pour in the wet. Mix gently, lumps are ok.
Lightly oiled pan on med heat (5/10), 1/4 c batter each pancake.

name: drop scones
directions: Mix dry ingredients. Make well in center and add egg + 100ml milk.
Beat well til smooth thick batter. Add enough milk til batter is like thick cream (probably ~166ml total).
Heat large non-stick pan (5/10 heat) and grease very slightly. Drop 12g spoons onto hot pan (12g makes tiny ones!).
Give enough space to spread. When surface bubbles, flip and cook for another 30sec-1min (til lightly golden). Cooks very fast!!

name: blini
directions: Whisk flours, salt, yeast. Make well in center, pour in milk. Whisk til smooth. Let batter rise til doubled (1hr).
Stir in butter and egg yolk into batter. Whisk egg whites in separate bowl til stiff but not dry.
